description: This file demonstrates the usage of the MistralEmbedder for generating embeddings from text and initializing an AgentKnowledge object with a PgVector database connection, embedding table, and embedder.

classes.name: AgentKnowledge
classes.description: Represents a knowledge base for an agent, utilizing a vector database and embedder.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class for interacting with a PostgreSQL vector database.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Generates embeddings for a given text input using MistralEmbedder.
